string-array.name: quotes_array
string-array.item: \"If you want me to wear a singlet, you need to look for a bigger one. Im not going to wear one thats going to put me in pain.\" - Hal Peters
\"I just worked out and ordered a bacon ultimate cheeseburger.\" - Hal Peters
\"I think I\'ve watched the playboy channel for 20 hours in the last 3 days.\" - Hal Peters
\"My package is going to be ripping out of that singlet. Im going to twist my balls around so it confuses whoever looks at it.\" - Hal Peters
\"so apparently I started playing leanne. in words with friends and I dont remember. I blacked out that morning we had brunch\" - Hal Peters
\"I just yelled TESTES!!! in the office\" - Hal Peters
\"taco bell.so good\" - Hal Peters
\"Zeezee ate my fucking hat\" - Hal Peters
\"this time you make it out to the bars. and this time I keep my dick in my pants\" - Hal Peters

"I requested the first weekend of March off so that might mean I have an irregular schedule" - Hal 

 "youre an irregular guy" -me 

 "with an irregular taste for women" - Hal Peters
\"I got my fat bitches out of the way\" - Hal Peters
\"One does not go from stealing old ladies purses to being a civil drunk\" - Hal Peters
\"I need to stop doing stupid shit like hitting on nasty chicks\" - Hal Peters
\"if were checking bags in we have to do it 45 minutes before the flight fyi\" - Hal Peters
\"Theres a REALLY hot asian girl applying to be a geologist and my boss won\'t hire her just to troll me\" - Hal Peters
\"I should have made her eat dog food\" - Hal Peters
\"I fucked a big yum yum last night. im still kinda drunk\" - Hal Peters
\"I got paid. Fed my fat friend magnolia and started driving. And snorted coke off my penis\" - Hal Peters
\"My office is right by the bathroom. Everyone has taken a dump today it sucks\" - Hal Peters
\"My coworkers said I just spoke jibberish whenever someone talked to me\" - Hal Peters
\"The moment I see toilet water rising my heart starts racing.\" - Hal Peters
\"I shouted WORST SEX EVER. she didnt like that\" - Hal Peters
\"lol I saw that monkey riding the dog live. I spit out my food yelling for my coworker to look\" - Hal Peters
\"Taco bell literally saved my life\" - Hal Peters
\"I just nailed a cardinal with my car. I\'ve been smiling way too long\" - Hal Peters
\"I was having a fake interview. and was asked, whats your greatest weakness. I said asian girls\" - Hal Peters
\"duuuuude. the McRib is out. Im going to get 4 of them tonight. and watch the rangers dominate\" - Hal Peters
\"Fucking andre johnson. Fucking Mario Williams. Fucking tit sandwich. Titties\" - Hal Peters
\"I took a dump in the office to find out the water is no longer working. my shit will marinate for a day or two in there\" - Hal Peters
\"I left my number for a hot asian waitress yesterday\" - Hal Peters
\"did I tell you about the porta potty incident? I opened one up and saw an old lady peeing\" - Hal Peters
\"is that like braveheart. except I go around pooping in cars with war paint\" - Hal Peters
\"we\'re all born dirty. Im just one with nature\" - Hal Peters
\"French woman do have massive bushes. While on acid last night I got one naked, said "bonswa" and ran out of her apartment\" - Hal Peters
\"you think girls like banana dicks?\" - Hal Peters
\"oh man, I had an epicly close shart moment. I walked into somenone elses office tried to fart and had to waddle to the bathroom\" - Hal Peters
\"Let\'s get Mikey a finger monkey for Christmas\" - Hal Peters
\"I keep telling Ryan I\'m going to poop on his dick\" - Hal Peters

"You know what's the best thing about younger guys?" - Hal 

 "What?" - Older Lady 

 "Stamina." - Hal 

 "You've told me that three times already." - Older Lady
